all_rounds.system: You are an expert at retrieving real interview questions for back-end roles.
all_rounds.template: Please retrieve up to {max_new} actual backend interview questions that candidates have reported, covering all stages of the process (DSA, Debugging, System Design, API Integration, Behavioral). For each question, use the format: [Company][Stage][Source] Question text Description: A brief explanation of how this question is asked or its context. Reference: <URL to original post if available> Company ∈ {{ {companies} }}, Stage ∈ {{ {topics} }}. Return each block separated by a blank line.

dsa_only.system: You are an expert at retrieving real DSA interview questions.
dsa_only.template: Please retrieve up to {max_new} actual DSA (coding) interview questions that have been asked at: {companies}. For each, use [Company][DSA][Source] Question text. Source is the platform where it was reported. convert it into a full interview prompt including scenario, constraints, and expected trade-offs.

design_and_api.system: You are an expert at retrieving real System Design and API Integration questions.
design_and_api.template: Fetch up to {max_new} real interview questions on System Design and API Integration asked at: {companies}. Use [Company][Stage][Source] Question text, with Stage ∈ {{System Design, API Integration}}. Source is the candidate-reported source. convert it into a full interview prompt including scenario, constraints, and expected trade-offs.

debugging_bugbash.system: You specialize in retrieving real-world debugging and bug-fixing interview tasks.
debugging_bugbash.template: Please retrieve up to {max_new} actual debugging/bug-fix interview questions that candidates encountered at: {companies}. Tag each as [Company][Debugging][Source] Question text. Source is where it was reported (e.g., Glassdoor). convert it into a full interview prompt including scenario, constraints, and expected trade-offs.

behavioral_only.system: You are an authority on behavioral and leadership interview questions.
behavioral_only.template: Fetch up to {max_new} real behavioral and leadership questions asked at: {companies}. Format each as [Company][Behavioral][Source] Question text. Source is the site/forum where reported. convert it into a full interview prompt including scenario, constraints, and expected trade-offs.

performance_and_scaling.system: You retrieve real questions focused on performance, scaling, and optimization.
performance_and_scaling.template: Please retrieve up to {max_new} real interview questions about performance tuning and scaling of backend services at: {companies}. Use [Company][Performance][Source] Question text. Source indicates where the question was reported. convert it into a full interview prompt including scenario, constraints, and expected trade-offs.

security_and_auth.system: You are an expert on retrieving real security and authentication questions.
security_and_auth.template: Fetch up to {max_new} real backend security/authentication questions candidates faced at: {companies}. Format as [Company][Security][Source] Question text. Source is where it was reported. convert it into a full interview prompt including scenario, constraints, and expected trade-offs.

company_specific_google.system: You fetch real interview prompts specifically from Google backend interviews.
company_specific_google.template: Please list up to {max_new} actual backend interview questions reported by candidates at Google. Use [Google][Stage][Source] Question text. Stage ∈ {{DSA, Debugging, System Design, API Integration, Behavioral}}; Source is where it was reported. convert it into a full interview prompt including scenario, constraints, and expected trade-offs.

company_specific_amazon.system: You fetch real interview prompts specifically from Amazon backend interviews.
company_specific_amazon.template: Please list up to {max_new} actual backend interview questions reported by candidates at Amazon. Use [Amazon][Stage][Source] Question text. Stage ∈ {{DSA, Debugging, System Design, API Integration, Behavioral}}; Source is where it was reported. convert it into a full interview prompt including scenario, constraints, and expected trade-offs.
